Name: SWP - QA - Fibertite Overlay Install Checklist (Non-masterlist)
Substrate complete and ready for SWP
Mechanically Fix existing roof pans to Purlins after checking underneath from inside that we're not going to puncture pipes or wires
Cut back existing roof edge at gutter
Surface/Substrate is dry, clean and free from sharp edges
All areas covered and lapped a minimum of 100mm
All holes/penetrations patched and made watertight
Surface is dry before installing Poly
Infills to be a minimum 5mm above ridges on roof
Substrate/surface dry & clean prior to being installed
Installed as per wind uplift fixing plan
Install 70mm X 100mm zincalume flashing at gutter edge for strength
Correct Glue being used for substrate
Wipe/clean laps with acetone prior to welding
All laps, details, penetrations fully welded/closed and QA'd with hook
All installation work complete, checked and reviewed as per specification
